property.name: dfs.data.dir
property.description: This property specifies the local filesystem path where the HDFS DataNode stores its data blocks.

property.name: dfs.replication
property.description: This property sets the default block replication factor in HDFS. It defines how many copies of each block will be stored across the cluster.

property.name: dfs.heartbeat.interval
property.description: This property specifies the interval (in seconds) between heartbeats sent by the DataNodes to the NameNode. It helps the NameNode monitor DataNode health.
